content.rendered:
Our team have unrivalled hands-on experience of vessel and project operations. We offer technical support and advice to clients which can include secondment to assist with the management of specific marine operations or for the duration of a specific project.

We produce policy documents, technical procedures and operational guidance to support company aims and ensure that ship managers’ instructions to shore staff and crews complies with current requirements and provides a consistent, practical platform for the safe and efficient management of ship operations.

We support ship managers by providing training during the implementation of procedures either in the office or on board ships, and this can be supported by auditing and compliance work to give valuable insights to ship managers regarding the adoption of policy in their workforce.

We can provide technical and practical help with the preparation of Emergency Response Manuals, ISM & ISO compliant manuals, functional specifications for complex marine operations, specialist operating manuals and manuals to support project cargo and Heavy Lift operations.
